parameter.value: Be greeted, dear visitor. Come and stay ... a while.
Wait as patiently as death is waiting for you!
Yes, flee from death. But know it shall be always one step behind you.
It hurts me to even think about my mortal past. Its long lost and forgotten. So don't ask me about it!
It is my curse to be the eternal guardian of this ancient place.
It served as a temple, a source of power and ... as a sender for an ancient race in time long gone by and forgotten.
The race that built this edifice came to this place from the stars. They ran from an enemy even more horrible than even themselves. But they carried the seed of their own destruction in them.
This ancient race was annihilated by its own doings, that's all I know. Aeons have passed since then, but the sheer presence of this complex is still defiling and desecrating this area.
This ancient race was annihilated by its own doings, that's all I know. Aeons have passed since then, but the sheer presence of this complex is still defiling and desecrating this area.

Its constructors were too strange for you or even me to understand. We cannot know what this ... thing they have built was supposed to be good for. All I can feel is a constant twisting and binding of souls, though that is probably only a side-effect.
The place you know as the Ghostlands had a different name once ... and many names thereafter. Too many for me to remember them all.
They are my maidens. They give me comfort in my eternal vigil over the last seal.
I am the guardian of the SEVENTH and final seal. The seal to open the last door before ... but perhaps it is better you see it with your own eyes.
